title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Everything To Know
description:
From story to new gameplay, locations, and villains, here's everything you need to know about Marvel’s Spider-Man 2. 

#gaming #SpiderMan2 #gamespot

title: Tattoo Historian Reacts To Tattoos In Games
description:
Dr Matt Lodder is a Senior Lecturer in Art History and Theory, Director of American Studies at the University of Essex, Tattoo Historian, and author of 'Painted People: Humanity in 21 Tattoos'.

In this video he is breaking down some of the tattoos from a selection of games from GTA V, Assassin's Creed, Yakuza, Hitman and more. 

Chapters:
Intro 00:00
GTA V - 00:43
Far Cry 3 - 04:18
Hitman: World of Assassination - 07:39
WWE 2K - 10:10
Tattoo Assassins - 12:39
Assassin's Creed Valhalla - 14:11
Like a Dragon/Yakuza Series -  18:24


Check out more of Matt here:
Book ‘Painted People: Humanity in 21 Tattoos’ (Hardback, Paperback and Audiobook): https://harpercollins.co.uk/products/painted-people-humanity-in-21-tattoos-matt-lodder?variant=39742105681998 
Amazon: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Painted-People-Story-Humanity-Tattoos/dp/000840206X
